title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: The FIB Files Bonuses for Bosses, Associates, and Bodyguards
content:
Taking on any FIB File Finale — Priority or otherwise — as a Boss will get you an extra GTA$200,000 (delivered within 72 hours of completion). All Associates and Bodyguards providing their services on these Finales receive 3X GTA$ and RP.

Associates and Bodyguards who earn over GTA$100,000 in any line of work will complete the Weekly Challenge for an additional GTA$100,000 bonus.
